rev.desc.rev.desc: Shortcut key conflict in "Inactivity Timer" configuration page
resolve the shortcut in inactiveity timer setup page.
change the option of end button, if option is not 3, page cannot be closed by clicking 'X'
The Inactivity timer should be configurable per user in the operator record
remove the kill.inactive call in schedule record, since RTE will check the inactive time via heart beat
add validation when starting/reseting inactive timer.
parse $foomin to number avoid number to date exception
The Inactivity timer should be configurable per user in the operator record
remove the kill.inactive call in schedule record, since RTE will check the inactive time via heart beat
add validation when starting/reseting inactive timer.
parse $foomin to number avoid number to date exception
The Inactivity timer should be configurable per user in the operator record
remove the kill.inactive call in schedule record, since RTE will check the inactive time via heart beat
add validation when starting/reseting inactive timer.
parse $foomin to number avoid number to date exception
The Inactivity timer should be configurable per user in the operator record
remove the kill.inactive call in schedule record, since RTE will check the inactive time via heart beat
add validation when starting/reseting inactive timer.
DE971: removed all references to $only.odbc
Fixed localization issues.
Case insensitivity problem fixes.
Added another field to time out ODBC connections. Panels with the $only.odbc variable added/initialized include set.no.sched, set.on.sched.b, update.sched, add.sched, exit.normal, and exit.error
Adjusted funtionality for stop inact to push schedule date 15 years into the future. Added option to delete inact for total removal of the schedule record.
scmsg

descript.descript: Shortcut key conflict in "Inactivity Timer" configuration page
resolve the shortcut in inactiveity timer setup page.
change the option of end button, if option is not 3, page cannot be closed by clicking 'X'
The Inactivity timer should be configurable per user in the operator record
remove the kill.inactive call in schedule record, since RTE will check the inactive time via heart beat
add validation when starting/reseting inactive timer.
parse $foomin to number avoid number to date exception
The Inactivity timer should be configurable per user in the operator record
remove the kill.inactive call in schedule record, since RTE will check the inactive time via heart beat
add validation when starting/reseting inactive timer.
parse $foomin to number avoid number to date exception
The Inactivity timer should be configurable per user in the operator record
remove the kill.inactive call in schedule record, since RTE will check the inactive time via heart beat
add validation when starting/reseting inactive timer.
parse $foomin to number avoid number to date exception
The Inactivity timer should be configurable per user in the operator record
remove the kill.inactive call in schedule record, since RTE will check the inactive time via heart beat
add validation when starting/reseting inactive timer.
DE971: removed all references to $only.odbc
Fixed localization issues.
Case insensitivity problem fixes.

Added another field to time out ODBC connections. Panels with the $include.odbc & $onlyu.odbc variables added/initialized include set.no.sched, set.on.sched.b, update.sched, add.sched, exit.normal, and exit.error
Adjusted funtionality for stop inact to push schedule date 15 years into the future. Added option to delete inact for total removal of the schedule record.
scmsg
